name: @shardus/monitor-server
description: Monitor server for the Shardus Enterprise server.

scripts.release:prepatch: npm run prepare && npm version prepatch --preid=prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag prerelease
scripts.release:preminor: npm run prepare && npm version preminor --preid=prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag prerelease
scripts.release:premajor: npm run prepare && npm version premajor --preid=prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag prerelease
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run prepare && npm version prerelease --preid=prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag prerelease
scripts.release:patch: npm run prepare && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prepare && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run prepare && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Shardus
